quest.group_name_key: Getting More Out of Your Ammo

Find the supplies for and craft 10 first aid bandages.
Find the supplies for and craft 5 herbal antibiotics.
A Chemistry Station is used to make complex medical items. Craft and place a Chemistry Station.
Find the supplies for and craft 10 first aid kits. You must be INSIDE the station when this craft completes to receive credit for the quest.
Find the supplies for and craft 5 antibiotics. You must be INSIDE the station when this craft completes to receive credit for the quest.
Find the supplies for and craft 1 Anti Venom. You must be INSIDE the station when this craft completes to receive credit for the quest.
Find the supplies for and craft 3 grams of Blue Ice. You must be INSIDE the station when this craft completes to receive credit for the quest.
Find the supplies for and craft 5 Anti Radiation Pills. You must be INSIDE the station when this craft completes to receive credit for the quest.
Kill 15 zombies with your Blunderbuss.
Kill 25 zombies with a pitchfork.
A Mortar and Pestle is used to make various seeds out of plants. You will need to craft one in the forge and place it to complete this quest.
Craft the following seeds in the Mortar and Pestle. You must be INSIDE the Pestle craft screen when the seed completes to receive quest credit.
Plant the seeds you crafted in your garden. They will take about 7 hours in game to grow.
Craft the following seeds in the Mortar and Pestle. You must be INSIDE the Pestle craft screen when the seed completes to receive quest credit.
Plant the seeds you crafted in your garden. They will take about 7 hours in game to grow.

Plant the seeds you crafted in your garden. They will take about 7 hours in game to grow.

Plant the seeds you crafted in your garden. They will take about 7 hours in game to grow.
Kill 15 zombies with your Wooden Bow.
Hunt for 2 Stags and kill them. Harvest them with the skinning knife and acquire hides.
Hunt for 2 Boars and kill them. Harvest them with the butcher knife and acquire white meat.
quest.offer_key: Jax and the boys are hungry and need a day's worth of food. Fetch him some and he might reward you Prospect.

quest.description_key: The guys are thirsty. Fetch some cans and water and cook them up.
quest.offer_key: Jax and the boys are hungry and need a day's worth of food. Fetch him some and he might reward you Prospect.

quest.description_key: A Rain Catcher can supply you with water when you need it most. You can learn how to craft this by purchasing the Self Sufficient Perk when you are the proper level. Acquire the materials and craft and place a Rain Catcher. It can be emptied every 7 in game hours.

A Chicken Coop can supply you with fresh meat eggs and feathers every 7 in game hours. You can learn how to craft this by purchasing the Self Sufficient Perk when you are the proper level. Place the coop, craft some chicken feed and right click on the coop to feed the seeds to the coop.
Find the weapon associated with this quest in order to complete it. These recipes will not appear in Crafting menus.
Kill 100 zombies with a Rocket Launcher.
Gather the required materials and find a sewing kit in night stands and dressers as well as a welding torch. Craft a Tailor Station
To craft this you must be in the Tailor Station.

To wear your animal hide armor, access the Inventory and select an article of clothing, then select Wear in the Action window. Once dressed, access the Character menu to see the insulation and defense your worn clothing provides in the top left of the Character window.
To craft this you must be in the Tailor Station.

To wear your leather armor, access the Inventory and select an article of clothing, then select Wear in the Action window. Once dressed, access the Character menu to see the insulation and defense your worn clothing provides in the top left of the Character window.
To craft this you must be in the Tailor Station.

To wear your scrap armor, access the Inventory and select an article of clothing, then select Wear in the Action window. Once dressed, access the Character menu to see the insulation and defense your worn clothing provides in the top left of the Character window.
To craft this you must be in the Tailor Station.

To wear your iron armor, access the Inventory and select an article of clothing, then select Wear in the Action window. Once dressed, access the Character menu to see the insulation and defense your worn clothing provides in the top left of the Character window.
To craft this you must be in the Tailor Station

To wear your steel armor, access the Inventory and select an article of clothing, then select Wear in the Action window. Once dressed, access the Character menu to see the insulation and defense your worn clothing provides in the top left of the Character window.

You MUST remain in the Workbench as it completes to get credit for this quest. To craft military armor you will need to first gather or craft military fibers, you can craft military fibers with leather and cloth at the Chemistry Station. Once you have the ingredients, access the workbench and locate the Clothing category of the Crafting window.

To wear your military armor, access the Inventory and select an article of clothing, then select Wear in the Action window. Once dressed, access the Character menu to see the insulation and defense your worn clothing provides in the top left of the Character window.

It has been established that persons who have recently died have been returning to life and committing acts of murder. A widespread investigation of funeral homes, morgues, and hospitals has concluded that the unburied dead have been returning to life and seeking human victims. It's hard for us here to be reporting this to you, but it does seem to be a fact.All persons who die during this crisis from whatever cause will come back to life to seek human victims, unless their bodies are first disposed of by cremation.!
quest.offer_key: It has been established that persons who have recently died have been returning to life and committing acts of murder. A widespread investigation of funeral homes, morgues, and hospitals has concluded that the unburied dead have been returning to life and seeking human victims. It's hard for us here to be reporting this to you, but it does seem to be a fact.All persons who die during this crisis from whatever cause will come back to life to seek human victims, unless their bodies are first disposed of by cremation.

quest.description_key: The merciful killings.
quest.offer_key: The merciful killings.

quest.description_key: It becomes easier with time
quest.offer_key: It becomes easier with time

quest.description_key: Emotionally numb, you no longer stop to think about your actions and accept your fate.
quest.offer_key: Emotionally numb, you no longer stop to think about your actions and accept your fate.

quest.description_key: There may be some hope left after all. Kill Them All!
quest.offer_key: There may be some hope left after all. Kill Them All!

quest.description_key: Hey survivor. This chick I've been trying to get with in our group for months now refuses to put out unless we get 'married' - as if thats even a thing anymore. To make matters worse she won't accept unless she has some fancy ring. Nothing I've tried has been enough for her highness. Find me a diamond ring and I'll make make it worth your while - it'll certaily be worth mine!
quest.offer_key: Hey survivor. This chick I've been trying to get with in our group for months now refuses to put out unless we get 'married' - as if thats even a thing anymore. To make matters worse she won't accept unless she has some fancy ring. Nothing I've tried has been enough her her highness. Find me a diamond ring and I'll make make it worth your while - it'll certaily be worth mine!

quest.description_key: Nothing shows ones worth like a luxurious wallet. Bring me something worthy of holding my cash and I will reward you.
quest.offer_key: Nothing shows ones worth like a luxurious wallet. Bring me something worthy of holding my cash and I will reward you.

quest.description_key: Greetings there fellow traveler. In todays hellish world it is a tragic shame and loss that many of the classic novels and stories that have lasted for generations have so quickly and easily been tossed aside - or worse, scrapped for mere paper! Please, should you find any of these timeless treasures send them my way. I will reward you handsomely for your troubles.
quest.offer_key: Greetings there fellow traveler. In todays hellish world it is a tragic shame and loss that many of the classic novels and stories that have lasted for generations have so quickly and easily been tossed aside - or worse, scrapped for mere paper! Please, should you find any of these timeless treasures send them my way. I will reward you handsomely for your troubles.

quest.description_key: Gather classic novels from before the outbreak for the avid reader.
Gather classic novels from before the outbreak for the avid reader.

Hello. A child came into our group recently who, understandably, is in poor shape since the loss of her parents. If you find anything out there that might help her take her mind off things we'd be greatly appreciate it. We do not have much but we will reward you as best we can.
quest.offer_key: Hello. A child came into our group recently who, understandably, is in poor shape since the loss of her parents. If you find anything out there that might help her take her mind off things we'd be greatly appreciate it. We do not have much but we will reward you as best we can.

quest.description_key: Try to find items that might be suitable for a child.
Try to find items that might be suitable for a child.

Hey traveler. While every trader I come across seems to have plenty of random bits and bobs - the one thing I really miss and want is toilet paper. I am sick of paper cuts and rashes! Please, if you find any out there send it my way.
quest.offer_key: Hey traveler. While every trader I come across seems to have plenty of random bits and bobs - the one thing I really miss and want is toilet paper. I am sick of paper cuts and rashes! Please, if you find any out there send it my way.

quest.description_key: Hello traveler. I recently came across a stash of old cassette tapes but have no way to enjoy them. If you come across any old walkmans out there, send it my way. I'll pay you handsomely!
quest.offer_key: Hello traveler. I recently came across a stash of old cassette tapes but have no way to enjoy them. If you come across any old walkmans out there, send it my way. I'll pay you handsomely!

quest.description_key: Certain members of our group have been getting more rowdy than usual lately. We all cope in different ways, I suppose, but the last thing we need is more mouths to feed or a little screamer to draw the biter's attention. If you find any rubbers out there send it our way and we'll make it worth your while. No used ones, either, smartass!
quest.offer_key: Certain members of our group have been getting more rowdy than usual lately. We all cope in different ways, I suppose, but the last thing we need is more mouths to feed or a little screamer to draw the biter's attention. If you find any rubbers out there send it our way and we'll make it worth your while. No used ones, either, smartass!

quest.description_key: Hey there slugger! If you find any autographed baseballs out there send them my way and I'll make it worth your while. Someone has to keep the tradition alive - might as well be me!
quest.offer_key: Hey there slugger! If you find any autographed baseballs out there send them my way and I'll make it worth your while. Someone has to keep the tradition alive - might as well be me!

quest.description_key: Howdy survivor. I lost my last good pack of playing cards after a bunch of bitters overran our last camp. I miss them almost as much as our cook. If you come across any on your travels I'd be mighty grateful!
quest.offer_key: Howdy survivor. I lost my last good pack of playing cards after a bunch of bitters overran our last camp. I miss them almost as much as our cook. If you come across any on your travels I'd be mighty grateful!

quest.description_key: Listen bud, It won't be a biter that takes me down. If I'm going out, Im going out with my smokes. But its hard to do that when you can't find the bloody things. Please, if you come across a pack in your journey I'll pay you well for it.
quest.offer_key: Listen bud, It won't be a bitter that takes me down. If I'm going out, Im going out with my smokes. But its hard to do that when you can't find the bloody things. Please, if you come across a pack in your journey I'll pay you well for it.

quest.description_key: People just don't understand! I must express myself, how else will I leave my mark on this world? I must capture the struggle of man in todays harsh world through paint! However these savages I'm stuck with don't seem to appreciate the necessity of what I'm trying to do! If you find any art supplies in your adventures I'll pay you well for it.
quest.offer_key: People just don't understand! I must express myself, how else will I leave my mark on this world? I must capture the struggle of man in todays harsh world through paint! However these savages I'm stuck with don't seem to appreciate the necessity of what I'm trying to do! If you find any art supplies in your adventures I'll pay you well for it.

quest.description_key: Hey man. Check it, this jack-off in our group smashed my only bong in a druken rage. If you find one out there in one of your wild journeys could you send it my way? I can sneak you some coins if you do, man.
quest.offer_key: Hey man. Check it, this jack-off in our group smashed my only bong in a drunken rage. If you find one out there in one of your wild journeys could you send it my way? I can sneak you some coins if you do, man.

quest.description_key: Find and kill three fat male and female zombies.
quest.offer_key: Kill 6 Fat Zombies.

quest.description_key: Read for 1 Skill Point!
Read for 3 Skill Points!
Read for 5 Skill Points!
Tools for Testing for Admins
quest.offer_key: Reading this will give you some Admin Tools for Testing Purposes

quest.description_key: Clothing for Testing for Admins
quest.offer_key: Reading this will give you some Admin Clothing for Testing Purposes

quest.description_key: 5 Admin Skill Points for Testing
15 Admin Skill Points for Testing
